An anti-Israel activist was so distraught after seeing a flag with the same colors as Israel. Subsequently, she tore it down, as she believed Israel was committing genocide.

But the only problem with what she did was that it was not the Israeli flag, it was the Greek flag.

Anti-Israel activist tears down GREEK flags outside a Greek restaurant after mistaking the flags for Israeli ones in New Jersey. pic.twitter.com/hNwBUpod2o
— Oli London (@OliLondon
title: Anti-Israel nincompoop tears down what she THINKS are Jewish flags, but needs a geography lesson
